titleStmt.title: A declaration presented to the right honourable the Lords and Commons, in the high court of Parliament of England assembled of the humble representations of the grand inquest of the coury of Yorke. Concerning the kingdome of Scotland, and setling the government of the kingdome of England. May 8. 1648. Imprimatur Gil. Mabbot.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Ibbitson in Smithfield, neere the Queens-head Tavern,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
